prompts: Create a playful psychic-type Pokemon with a round body and a silly expression.
Imagine a bipedal Pokemon that uses dreams to battle its foes.
Design a creature that loves to nap, featuring yellow skin and dark pants.
Generate a quirky character that thrives in urban habitats and loves to snack.
Show me a medium-sized Pokemon with a unique nose and a big smile.
Make a Pokemon that can hypnotize its opponents, with a distinctively chunky look.
Give me a fun and sleepy Pokemon that enjoys hanging out in grasslands.
